translations: v．打瞌睡，昏昏欲睡：处于半睡半醒的状态。
· He drowses in the armchair after lunch.
午饭后他在扶手椅上打瞌睡。

sentences.sentence: He sleeps badly at nights, alone , and drowses now on the grassy breadth of day, idly blissful, snug on the right side at last.
sentences.translation: 晚上他一个人睡得很差劲，此刻他大白天在草地上打盹儿，怡然自得，舒舒服服，得其所哉。
